propertyFields.name: certificate
propertyFields.description: x509 certificate chain generated by xsuaa service

propertyFields.name: privateKey
propertyFields.description: Private key related to the generated certificate

propertyFields.name: oAuthTokenUrl
propertyFields.description: OAuth token URL to call on retrieving token

methods.name: getAuthorizationHeaderValue()
methods.description: Calls the oAuthTokenUrl and if username and password or username, certificate and privateKey are correct will retrieve an access token which will be cached for further use. If the access token is about to expire a new request to OAuth service will be made
